duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding high-level customer service to residents in a fast-paced, high-volume environment.
Assist residents in person or over the phone in a well-mannered and professional way.
Handle property issues and general property condition assessments (GPCAs) while maintaining a positive resident experience.
Complete resident welcome calls and emails to help ensure a seamless move-in experience.
Assist in processing Public Housing Agency applications and communicating with the Housing Authority.
Perform outbound delinquency calls to residents for rent collections and assist in handling residents responsible Home Owner Association violations.
Review and work through all action items on applicable task list.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED certificate. Proven experience in Property Management administration or customer service.
